attributes.action: Condemn persecution of Christians in INDIA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Honourable Prime Minister,
 
I would be grateful if you can cover the stories happening in India specially related to anti christian violence.
 
There are more than 30 killings and more then 3000 families displaced due to fear for life. Nuns are raped and burned, locals are killed, churches and religious institution are damaged. Violence on christians is spreading from one state to another.
 
Till now nothing is telecast on BBC IN U.K. If anything happens to Muslim community it is in the forefront of BBC NEWS. Why not help a minority who are in difficult time in India.
 
Hope you will do the needfull.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
